articles.description: Fortnite is getting new in-game skins based on some of the biggest soccer clubs in the world, including Manchester City, Juventus, and AC Milan, as well as an emote based on Brazilian legend Pelé. Faze Clan is also partnering with City for an in-game tourname…
articles.content:
Plus theres a Pelé emote
Epic has partnered with some of the biggest soccer clubs in the world for its latest set of Fortnite skins. Today, the developer unveiled the new kickoff set, which lets pla… [+1998 chars]
